title: Tools For Android Wear
summary: Must have toolbox for Android Wear with disconnection alert and phone finder

description: Must have toolbox for Android Wear operation system. Get an alert when watch disconnects from phone with the alert app. Locate your phone with the phone finder app when cell phone is out of sight. More tools will be added soon. Download now for free. To start phone finder. Just say: OK Google...Start phone finder.Get more apps, games & news with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxsPlease note:-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Phone Finder" or say "Start phone finder"Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
descriptionHTML:
Must have toolbox for Android Wear operation system. Get an alert when watch disconnects from phone with the alert app. Locate your phone with the phone finder app when cell phone is out of sight. More tools will be added soon. Download now for free. To start phone finder. Just say: OK Google...Start phone finder.


Get more apps, games & news with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Phone Finder" or say "Start phone finder"


Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
comments: Used to work but now phone finder doesn't even start. Nothing updated and no settings changed. So, what happened?

Sony sw3 This app needs to be removed it is junk and does not work.this app does not work please remove it.I will call Google to have it removed .you developer should be smart enough to reply to these poor reviews.
Doesn't work Phone finder just shows an error when to try to ring phone on Sony Smartwatch 3
Only half seems to work. It's good about telling me if I get away from my phone, but the phone finder will not run on my s3
do not install this app! killed my moto 360 will not reboot!!!!
Doesn't seem to do anything just downloaded, and when I click on the app on my Moto 360, nothing happens. I'm uninstalling now.
